languages.text: "Кхм, вроде бы это были краснорясники, прибывшие на торжество принятия власти новым губернатором. То есть мной". {n}Руолдо провожает печальным взглядом сбегающего со стола кревециуса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Да, идексиане. На торжество избрания нового губернатора. То есть меня". {n}Руолдо провожает печальным взглядом очередного сбежавшего со стола кревециуса.{/n}

languages.text: "Ehm, I think they were the red robes who arrived to celebrate the ascendance of a new governor. That's me." {n}Ruoldo's wistful gaze follows a shrimperius fleeing the table.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ehm, I think they were the red robes who arrived to celebrate the ascendance of a new governor. That's me." {n}Ruoldo's wistful gaze follows a shrimperius fleeing the table.{/n}
"These are the Idexians who arrived to celebrate the elevation of a new Governor. That would be me." {n}Ruoldo's wistful gaze follows a shrimperius fleeing the table.{/n}

languages.text: “呃，我觉得那些红袍人来这里，是为了庆祝新任总督正式就任。没错，也就是我。”{n}罗尔多若有所思，盯着一条从餐桌上逃走的五尾虾。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ehm, I think they were the red robes who arrived to celebrate the ascendance of a new governor. That's me." {n}Ruoldo's wistful gaze follows a shrimperius fleeing the table.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “呃，我觉得那些红袍人来这里，是为了庆祝新任总督正式就任。没错，也就是我。”{n}罗尔多若有所思，盯着一条从餐桌上逃走的五尾虾。{/n}

languages.text: «Supongo que los túnicas rojas vinieron para celebrar el ascenso del nuevo gobernador. Ese fui yo». {n}La melancólica mirada de Ruoldo sigue a un gamboide que intenta escapar de la mesa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ehm, I think they were the red robes who arrived to celebrate the ascendance of a new governor. That's me." {n}Ruoldo's wistful gaze follows a shrimperius fleeing the table.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Supongo que los túnicas rojas vinieron para celebrar el ascenso del nuevo gobernador. Ese fui yo». {n}La melancólica mirada de Ruoldo sigue a un gamboide que intenta escapar de la mesa.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu kimseler; göreve gelen yeni valiyi, yani beni tebrik etmek için uğrayan kırmızı cübbeliler olmalı." {n}Ruoldo, masadan sıvışan bir imparidesini hüzünlü gözlerle izliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ehm, I think they were the red robes who arrived to celebrate the ascendance of a new governor. That's me." {n}Ruoldo's wistful gaze follows a shrimperius fleeing the table.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu kimseler; göreve gelen yeni valiyi, yani beni tebrik etmek için uğrayan kırmızı cübbeliler olmalı." {n}Ruoldo, masadan sıvışan bir imparidesini hüzünlü gözlerle izliyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「新たな総督の昇進を祝うために到着した赤ローブの集団だろう。それは私です」{n}ルオルドの物欲しそうな視線がテーブルから逃げるシュリンペリウスを追う。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ehm, I think they were the red robes who arrived to celebrate the ascendance of a new governor. That's me." {n}Ruoldo's wistful gaze follows a shrimperius fleeing the table.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「新たな総督の昇進を祝うために到着したイデックス人だろう。それは私です」{n}ルオルドの物欲しそうな視線がテーブルから逃げるシュリンペリウスを追う。{/n}

languages.text: « Hum... Je crois qu'il s'agit des robes rouges venues célébrer l'avènement d'un nouveau gouverneur. Ma nomination. » {n}Ruoldo suit du regard une crevimperius qui se carapate hors de la table.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ehm, I think they were the red robes who arrived to celebrate the ascendance of a new governor. That's me." {n}Ruoldo's wistful gaze follows a shrimperius fleeing the table.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Hum... Je crois qu'il s'agit des robes rouges venues célébrer l'avènement d'un nouveau gouverneur. Ma nomination. » {n}Ruoldo suit du regard une crevimperius qui se carapate hors de la table.{/n}

languages.text: "Äh, ich glaube, das waren die Roten Roben, die der Herrschaft eines neuen Gouverneurs beiwohnen wollten. Meiner Wenigkeit." {n}Ruoldos Blick folgt sehnsüchtig einem vom Tisch fliehenden Shrimperius.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ehm, I think they were the red robes who arrived to celebrate the ascendance of a new governor. That's me." {n}Ruoldo's wistful gaze follows a shrimperius fleeing the table.{/n}
